Author: Alright#0419
Content: @Dr.Terminus the StakedNotary is very specific to LABS as of right now

Author: Dr.Terminus#3269
Content: so I can't become part of LABS ? cant go about it this way at all ?

Author: Alright#0419
Content: LABS is an entirely separate notary network. We're cap at 20 notaries right now. All the positions are currently filled, but we will be adding 2 additional spots every 2 months

Author: Alright#0419
Content: running a LABS notary is a bit different than running a KMD notary, but it's good for understanding what is required from you as a notary OP

Author: Dr.Terminus#3269
Content: I see.. do LABS notaries get KMD rewards?

Content: LABS notaries will earn LABS. It's a separate coin

Content: There is no way for you for to notarize/earn KMD unless elected
